installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Neverwinter Nights Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

# Download the latest version from the Beamdog website
if [ -z "$NWN_VERSION" ] || [ "$NWN_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    NWN_VERSION=$(curl -L -s 'https://registry.hub.docker.com/v2/repositories/beamdog/nwserver/tags' | jq -r '[."results"[]["name"] | select(test("\\d*\\.\\d*$"))][0]')
fi

cd /mnt/server
curl -o nwnee.zip -L https://nwn.beamdog.net/downloads/nwnee-dedicated-${NWN_VERSION}.zip
unzip -u nwnee.zip -d .

# Run the server once to generate default files and directories
cd bin/linux-x86 && ./nwserver-linux

# Copy generated files into the volume and update relevant paths
mv /root/.local/share/Neverwinter\ Nights /mnt/server/user
sed -i 's/\/root\/.local\/share\/Neverwinter Nights/\/home\/container\/user/g' /mnt/server/user/nwn.ini
sed -i 's/\/root\/.local\/share\/Neverwinter Nights/\/home\/container\/user/g' /mnt/server/user/nwnplayer.ini
sed -i 's/\/root\/.local\/share\/Neverwinter Nights/\/home\/container\/user/g' /mnt/server/user/settings.tml

echo "Installation complete."

variables.description: Name of the module we want to load. Official modules are stored in `~/data` and custom modules need to be stored in `~/user`. Must match the file name exactly without the extension.

variables.name: Load Slot #
variables.description: Save game slot number to load on boot.

variables.name: Max Number Of Clients
variables.description: Maximum number of connections to the game server.

variables.name: Minimum Level
variables.description: Minimum character level required to access the game server.

variables.name: Maximum Level
variables.description: Maximum character level required to access the game server.

variables.name: Pause And Play
variables.description:
Toggle game pausing permissions.
0 = game can only be paused by DM
1 = game can by paused by players

variables.name: PvP Mode
variables.description:
The mode of PvP enabled.
0 = none
1 = party
2 = full

variables.name: Server Vault Mode
variables.description:
0 = local characters only
1 = server characters only

variables.name: Enforce Legal Characters
variables.description: Toggle enforcement of legal characters.

variables.name: Enforce Item Level Restrictions
variables.description: Toggle enforcement of item level restrictions.

variables.name: Game Type
variables.description: Set which game room to post the game to. This only applies if the game is public.

variables.name: Toggle Single Parties
variables.description: Toggle if multiple parties are allowed.

variables.name: Difficulty
variables.description:
Game difficulty selection.
1 = easy
2 = normal
3 = D&D hardcore
4 = very difficult

variables.name: Auto Save Interval
variables.description: Interval between autosaves in minutes.

variables.name: Player Password
variables.description: Password needed to join the server as a player.

variables.name: DM Password
variables.description: Password needed to join the server as a DM.

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Name of the server as shown on the server browser.

variables.name: Is Public Game
variables.description: Toggle indicating if this is a public or private game.

variables.name: Reload When Empty
variables.description: Determines if the module state is persistent when the server is empty.
